*div1 type="summary"* *p*J. Blair to Austin, May 20, 1826. Offering services in fortification of coast.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="05-20-1826">May the 20th 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Colonel *person_mentioned*Austan*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear sir*/p* *p*presuming that after a perusal of the documents here with presented to geather with such other information as you will be able to collect you will be able to form an opinion conclusive for your self as to granting of the requests Actuated from motives of the highest sensibility I have ventured to submit for your consideration and that of your infant *location_mentioned*Republic */location_mentioned*the Subject Matter of the documents here with presented to geather with an offer of my services should your government be in a condition to Build a *location_mentioned*torpedul Bat- tery*/location_mentioned* or disposed to Garrison their *location_mentioned*harbours */location_mentioned*on this principal if so and the government of *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*will Extend their patronage with a degree of liberality that would support a *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*in a comfortabl manner and grant their *person_mentioned*petitioner */person_mentioned*an Exclusive privalage to furnish all the lumber that may be wanted to garrison the *location_mentioned*province of Texas*/location_mentioned* at a fair and Honest price togeather with a suitabl tract of land for a *location_mentioned*plantation */location_mentioned*for him self and *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*or any other arrangment that will insure a Comfortabl living your*person_mentioned* petitione[r]*/person_mentioned* would be more than happy to be come a *person_mentioned*Citizen */person_mentioned*of the *location_mentioned*Republick of america*/location_mentioned* etc etc*/p*
*p*Believe me Sir your Most devoted Servent and May God preserve your infant *location_mentioned*Republic */location_mentioned*from all internal strife till she [ ... ] a mong the Nations of the Earth that will yet giv laws to *location_mentioned*Europe*/location_mentioned* is the prair of*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J. Blair*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*NB Sir pleas to have this letter Translated and forwarded on to the General Government to Enable them to know how it was introduced to the General Government you may depend on the most unquestionable Recommendations of my carrector if necessary *person_mentioned*Colonel Austin*/person_mentioned* will oblige me if he will inform me if the same law that advertises for all those who have clames on the Government for military services rendered in *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1812">1812*/date_mentioned* and *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1813">13*/date_mentioned* imbraces those of *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1819">1819*/date_mentioned*—*date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1820">1820*/date_mentioned* and *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1821">1821*/date_mentioned* under *person_mentioned*General Long*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J. Blair*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*[Attached clipping:]*/p*
*p*"In the *location_mentioned*Natehitiches Courier,*/location_mentioned* of the *date_mentioned n="04-24-1826">24th April last*/date_mentioned*, we have seen a notice signed *person_mentioned*James Gaines*/person_mentioned*, calling upon the several *person_mentioned*volunteers*/person_mentioned* who fought in *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, in *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1812">1812*/date_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1813">13*/date_mentioned*, agreeably to a decree of the Mexican Congress, bearing date the *date_mentioned n="06-13-1823">13th June, 1823*/date_mentioned*, to come forward in person, or by power of attorney within six months with proof of their services, to receive their pay, agreeable to engagements entered into at *location_mentioned*St. Fernando de Bexar*/location_mentioned*, between the *person_mentioned*Junta */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Americans*/person_mentioned*, in *date_mentioned n="05-xx-1813">May, 1813*/date_mentioned*."*/p*
*/div1*
